header.shipping: Free delivery on orders within the UK!

quizPage.title: Congratulations, you can participate in a new promotion from Lego!
quizPage.textSelling: Sale of 3 construction sets in honour of Lego and Nike collaboration for
texts: Danish toy manufacturer Lego has entered into a long-term agreement with American sportswear brand Nike. The partnership is aimed at mutual audience engagement. In honour of this Lego is launching an attractive promotion where you can get a bundle of 3 different Lego sets for only

quiz.question: Which bundle of 3 sets would you like to receive?

footer: ©2024 The LEGO Group. All rights reserved.

products.name: starwars
products.descriptionText: Where to begin… LEGO® _Star Wars_™ is one of our most beloved themes ever, inspiring Jedi of all ages for over two decades. From several feet long Imperial Star Destroyers, to minutely detailed minifigures, and even classic family-friendly video games, there are more ways to enjoy LEGO Star Wars than you can shake a lightsaber at…

products.name: harrypotter
products.descriptionText: First years! This way, please. All other years? Um… This way too. It’s time to put on your LEGO™ Talking Sorting Hat™ and celebrate your House pride!

products.name: architecture
products.descriptionText: The LEGO® Architecture range transports adult model makers to the world’s most iconic landmarks and city skylines. These premium-quality sets offer a rewarding, mindful building experience and result in impressive display models that provide pleasure long after the construction work has been completed. LEGO Architecture takes adult model makers on the creative building journey of their life. And, for more hands-on, minds-on LEGO sets for adults, check out the complete collection at Adults Welcome.

products.name: marvel
products.descriptionText: Every Marvel fan has a hero saga mapped out in their mind, rivaling the Marvel movies. Unlock it by letting yourself control your own universe with these awesome Lego Marvel toys. Excelsior!

products.name: tech
products.descriptionText: Through mighty mechanisms or fine-tuned finesse features, LEGO® Technic™ makes things work. Behind each set are 3 principles: authenticity (like making our vehicles feel as lifelike as possible), functionality (like creating engines that work just like in the real world) and challenging (to give you the most rewarding build experience possible)!
